name: The Avrum Rosensweig Show: King of Questions

episodes.title: Rabbi Michael Skobac: A Globally Recognized Authority on Missionaries and Cults
episodes.description: Welcome to our podcast, where we delve into the fascinating world of religious studies with a focus on Rabbi Michael Skobac, a globally recognized authority on missionaries and cults. With an unparalleled depth of knowledge and insight, Rabbi Skobac navigates the intricate intersections of faith, culture, and belief systems, shedding light on the tactics employed by missionaries and cults to recruit and retain followers. Through his extensive research and engaging presentations, Rabbi Skobac offers invaluable perspectives that challenge conventional thinking and inspire critical inquiry into the dynamics of religious conversion and manipulation. Join us as we explore the profound wisdom and invaluable expertise of Rabbi Michael Skobac.
